s.text: As we roll out the new community journals, we are already planning the third phase of our life as a publisherÑthe creation of an online repository for all technically sound research reports in both biology and medicine, including clinical trial reports.
So why did PLoS become a publisher, and what are we doing in this role to serve the world's varying biomedical researchers and clinicians?
So why did PLoS become a publisher, and what are we doing in this role to serve the world's varying biomedical researchers and clinicians?
